thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Scholastic Reports Wider 1st-Quarter Loss

author: Lisa Beilfuss
title: Scholastic Reports Wider 1st-Quarter Loss
text:
Scholastic Corp., publisher of the “Harry Potter” series, on Thursday reported a wider loss in its latest quarter following the company’s sale of its educational technology segment.
The company tends to report a loss for its quarter ending in August, a seasonally weak period when most U.S. schools aren't in session. Excluding the contribution of the divested business to the year-ago period’s results, Scholastic’s loss for the quarter...
